description: This article will explain the importance of preprocessing in the machine learning pipeline by examining how centering and scaling can improve model performance.

description: In this tutorial, you'll learn about the use of the apply functions in R, its variants, and a few of its relatives applied to different data structures.

description: A tutorial on importing data into R. The focus is on reading data from sources like statistical software, databases, webscraping, and more.

description: There are different types of R plots, ranging from the basic graph types to complex types of graphs. Here we discover how to create these.

description: Data Science has its own language. This is a great list of often-heard data science terminology and quotes by Datacamp.
